game.name: Cats Hidden Around the World 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 로마, 두바이, 방콕 등 20개의 상징적인 장소에 숨어 있는 2000마리의 고양이를 찾아보세요! 이 귀엽고 손으로 그린 숨은그림찾기 게임은 원조 바이럴 ‘숨은 고양이’ 게임의 창작자 Travellin Cats가 만들었습니다! 전부 찾을 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Find 2000 cats hiding in 20 iconic locations such as Rome, Dubai or Bangkok in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game by Travellin Cats - the original viral hidden cats game creator! Can you find them all?

reviewHighlights.text: What a trip. [*]Between London, Edinburgh, and Rome - myself and every last one of my known blood relatives were called out in meows. [*]I'd met Björk...
If you have tried the smaller versions with only 1 city, this one is the same but with a lot more content. Everything took me a bit less than 2h. Ther...
